greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number T(n,k) of endofunctions on [n] with cycles of k distinct lengths; triangle T(n,k), n>=0, 0<=k<=A003056(n), read by rows.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Rows n = 0..140, flattened
maple: b:= proc(n, i, k) option remember; `if`(n=0, `if`(k=0, 1, 0),
T:= (n, k)-> add(binomial(n-1, j-1)*n^(n-j)*b(j$2, k), j=0..n):
mathematica: multinomial[n_, k_] := n!/Times @@ (k!); b[n_, i_, k_] := b[n, i, k] = If[n == 0, If[k==0, 1, 0], If[i<1 || k<1, 0, Sum[(i-1)!^j*multinomial[n, Join[ {n-i*j}, Array[i&, j]]]/j!*b[n-i*j, i-1, k-If[j==0, 0, 1]], {j, 0, n/i}]] ]; T[0, 0] = 1; T[n_, k_] := Sum[Binomial[n-1, j-1]*n^(n-j)*b[j, j, k], {j, 0, n}]; Table[T[n, k], {n, 0, 14}, {k, 0, Floor[(Sqrt[1+8n]-1)/2]}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Feb 18 2017, translated from Maple *)
xref: Cf. A003056, A060281, A218868 (the same for permutations).
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Aug 11 2014
